price: Gooftaa kiyya! Kan salaata dhaabu na godhi. Ilmaan kiyya irraas (akkasuma). Gooftaa keenya! kadhaa kiyyas narraa qeebali.
arabic: رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي مُقِيمَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِيۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلۡ دُعَآءِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: rabbi ij'ʿalnī muqīma al-ṣalati wamin dhurriyyatī rabbanā wataqabbal duʿāi
